content:
From: Oliver Pell <op@doc.ic.ac.uk>
Hi,

Has the "settings" menu option in Isabelle Proof General, that was under
the Isabelle/Isar menu, changed position in Isabelle2005? Mine appears
to have disappeared... Or does anyone know how to bring it back?

Thanks,

Oliver.

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Did you try the version of ProofGeneral from the Isabelle distribution
page? Also check if you have an old rpm/deb package of ProofGeneral
already installed, which is better removed first.

Makarius

From: David Aspinall <David.Aspinall@ed.ac.uk>
It's still where it was but will only appear once Isabelle is started.
If you don't see it, check that you are running a version of PG which supports
Isabelle2005.

  • D.

Oliver Pell wrote:
